## Government Tender Announcement for Personal Flotation Devices (PFDs)

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a National Individual Standing Offer for Personal Flotation Devices (PFDs). This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and is part of the RCMP's effort to enhance safety at sea.

### Overview of the Procurement

This procurement covers a two-year contract with the option to extend for an additional three periods of one year each. The RCMP requires a total of [insert number] PFDs to meet its operational needs.

### Procurement Details

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Compliant Bidder
*   **Contract Award**: One contract will be awarded as a result of this solicitation

### Important Dates and Addresses

*   **Publication Date**: October 24, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2023 at 14:00:00 (\*EST)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 28, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: November 28, 2025
*   **Procuring Office Address**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
    73 Leikin Dr, MS \# 15
    Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2
*   **Point of Contact**: Daniel Caughey, Procurement Officer
    Email: [Daniel.Caughey@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Daniel.Caughey@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
    Phone: 343-550-4936

### Documents to Review

The full tender document package, including the solicitation, is available for download from the Canada Buys website. Interested suppliers are advised to review the documents thoroughly and submit their tender in good time before the closing date.

### Important Notes

*   All the deliverables must be received within 30 days of the call-up notice.
*   The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
*   Canada has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in this solicitation.
